languages.text: "И вновь ты пытаешься заковать в свое писание то, что не постичь разуму. Вместо вопросов — ненависть. Вместо познания — добровольные оковы. Как же ваш вид страшится свободы..."
"Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."
languages.original_text: "И вновь ты пытаешься заковать в свое писание то, что не постичь разуму. Вместо вопросов — ненависть. Вместо познания — добровольные оковы. Как же ваш вид страшится свободы..."

traits.locale_text: "Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."
"Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."
"Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."
"Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."
"Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."

languages.text: 「またしても、言葉で捉えようとするんだな。理知では到底及ばぬものを。問いの代わりにあるのは憎悪。知識の代わりにあるのは自ら望んで嵌まる枷。お前たちの種族は、自由を恐れて生きている…」
languages.original_text: "Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."

traits.locale_text: 「またしても、言葉で捉えようとするんだな。理知では到底及ばぬものを。問いの代わりにあるのは憎悪。知識の代わりにあるのは自ら望んで嵌まる枷。お前たちの種族は、自由を恐れて生きている…」

languages.text: "Erneut versucht Ihr, in Worte zu fassen, was der Verstand nicht begreifen kann. Statt Fragen – Hass. Statt Wissen – freiwillige Fesseln. Eure Spezies lebt in Angst vor der Freiheit ..."
languages.original_text: "Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."

traits.locale_text: "Erneut versucht Ihr, in Worte zu fassen, was der Verstand nicht begreifen kann. Statt Fragen – Hass. Statt Wissen – freiwillige Fesseln. Eure Spezies lebt in Angst vor der Freiheit ..."

languages.text: « Une fois encore, vous essayez d'exprimer avec des mots ce que l'esprit ne peut appréhender. Au lieu de questions, la haine. Au lieu de la connaissance, des entraves volontaires. Votre espèce vit dans la terreur de la liberté... »
languages.original_text: "Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois encore, vous essayez d'exprimer avec des mots ce que l'esprit ne peut appréhender. Au lieu de questions, la haine. Au lieu de la connaissance, des entraves volontaires. Votre espèce vit dans la terreur de la liberté... »

languages.text: «Una vez más pretendes definir con palabras lo que tu mente es incapaz de comprender. En lugar de preguntas, odio. En lugar de conocimiento, grilletes voluntarios. Tu especie vive aterrorizada por la libertad...».
languages.original_text: "Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez más pretendes definir con palabras lo que tu mente es incapaz de comprender. En lugar de preguntas, odio. En lugar de conocimiento, grilletes voluntarios. Tu especie vive aterrorizada por la libertad...».

languages.text: “又来了，你又在试图用语言解释你的意识无法理解的东西。你心里没有任何好奇，只会充满仇恨；你从不渴求知识，而是自愿戴上枷锁。你的种族生活在对自由的恐惧之中……”
languages.original_text: "Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."

traits.locale_text: “又来了，你又在试图用语言解释你的意识无法理解的东西。你心里没有任何好奇，只会充满仇恨；你从不渴求知识，而是自愿戴上枷锁。你的种族生活在对自由的恐惧之中……”

languages.text: "Yine idrak edemediğini söze dökmeye çalışıyorsun. Sorgulamak yerine nefret, bilmek yerine gönüllü kölelik... Türün, özgürlük korkusuyla yaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "Once again, you try to pin down with words what the mind cannot comprehend. Instead of questions — hatred. Instead of knowledge — voluntary shackles. Your species lives in terror of freedom..."
